; Purpose
* [[Property description::Contains the concentration of an Solvent of a molecule used in an experiment or molecular process.@en]]

; Datatype
* [[Has type::Quantity]].

; Subproperty of
* [[Subproperty of::Concentration]]

; Values
* Input fields should be restricted to positive numbers (<nowiki>regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/</nowiki>).

; Corresponds
* [[Corresponds to::1 µM]]
* [[Corresponds to::0.001 mM]]
* [[Corresponds to::0.000001 M, Mol]]

; Unit
* [[Display units::µM]]
